com.apps.mooooood.icolormyworld

Class OpCVImage_using

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Activity
      • android.support.v4.app.SupportActivity
        • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
          • android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
            • com.apps.mooooood.icolormyworld.OpCVImage_using
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback

    public class OpCVImage_using
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
    OpCVImage_using.java - this class takes in images seleced by users from their device gallery and converts the image to a binary lined image as an example of how the openCV functions can work on an image and to provide an example of zoom and drag functionality on an Image View object
    Since:
    created 1/28/18, last updated - 5/12/18
    Author:
    Denise Fullerton

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class android.support.v4.app.SupportActivity

        android.support.v4.app.SupportActivity.ExtraData

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OpCVImage_using() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void backToMain(View view)
      onClick method that takes in img_to_main_btn button view object and finishes/closes activity_op_cvimage.xml view, resumes activity_main.xml view
      void canFilter(java.lang.String pictPath)
      Canny filter method using OpenCV functions method applies a canny filter to image in attempt enhance image edges as it is converted to a binary image method takes in the picture path to the selected image from device image gallery and sets converted image to image view object on screen
      void dragModeViewSwitch(View view)
      onClick method that takes in button view object When drag_mode_switch_btn is clicked, changes widget/button views visible on screen to display or remove zoom and pan buttons This allows user to use multitouch functionality to zoom and pan image, or use buttons to zoom and pan image
      void imageDown(View view) 
      void imageLeft(View view) 
      void imageRight(View view) 
      void imageUp(View view)
      onClick methods that takes in button view objects that allows the image on screen to be shifted based on directional button selected img_up_btn, img_down_btn, img_left_btn, and img_right_btn adding a constant value to the current x and y values of where the image is located on screen, which will then translate/shift where the image is located on screen using setTranslationX and setTranslationY
      void lapFilter(java.lang.String pictPath)
      Laplacian filter method using OpenCV functions method applies a laplacian filter to image in attempt enhance image feature edges as binary image method takes in the picture path to the selected image from device image gallery and sets converted image to image view object on screen
      protected void onActivityResult(int requestCode, int resultCode, Intent data)
      re-inflates activity_op_cvimage.xml after image is selected in from the device image gallery by the user, and displays resulting image based after image filters are applied method takes in request code to identify which intent the callback is using, resultCode from URI to ensure image will be returned, and intent including description of action to be performed and passed in activity
      protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
      inflates activity_op_cvimage.xml and instantiates buttons and listeners
      void onResume() 
      boolean onTouchEvent(MotionEvent e)
      onToucheEvent takes in motionEvent 'heard' and passes event to switch case to process course of action based on event always returns true
      void sobANDcan(java.lang.String pictPath)
      Combination Sobel and Canny filter method using OpenCV functions method applies a combination of a sobel filter and canny filter to image in attempt enhance image feature edges as binary image method takes in the picture path to the selected image from device image gallery and sets converted image to image view object on screen
      void sobFilter(java.lang.String pictPath)
      Sobel filter method using OpenCV functions method applies a sobel filter to image in attempt enhance image feature edges as the image is converted to a binary image method takes in the picture path to the selected image from device image gallery and sets converted image to image view object on screen
      void zoomIn(View view)
      onClick methods that takes in button view objects that changes the scale factor of the image using constant SCALE_CHANGE applied when zoom_in_btn or zoom_out_btn is clicked
      void zoomOut(View view)
